intro: Hoarea unguiculata, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its dense, velvety foliage and showy, clustered flowers. Hoarea unguiculata is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
